name: Mystic Ruins
description: Join Strade the explorer on his mission to investigate the Mystic Ruins. Navigate its labyrinthine corridors, solve its puzzles, gather treasures, and survive the onslaught of monsters within.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Any DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 250 MB available space
